MemoryInfobox.description: 'Odessa needed some herbs and a mixture for her sick father. She claimed she didn't want to leave his side and asked Kassandra to help gather what she lacked.'

General_Description: '''A Family Ordeal''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra found [[Odessa]] talking to two farmers at her [[Odessa's Estate|estate]] near the [[Port of Nisaia]].

Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped Odessa to retrieve herbs and mixtures for her father's illness. She also uncovered an attempt by the leader of Megaris to eliminate Odessa.
Section_Trivia:
The game offers three locations for the herbs, though only one needs to be visited.

If "[[A Life's Worth]]" is advanced to the point where The Master demands the player kill a woman, that woman turns out to be Odessa, and she is no longer marked "essential." This will make it possible for her to die when the bandits attack her home, very easily as difficulty increases. Conversely, an "essential" Odessa can defeat all of the attacking bandits by herself. This essential status can be restored by completing "A Life's Worth" by rejecting The Master.
